Hero.titlePart1: More than just a scanner app.
Hero.text: Bravo link is an all in one free scanner app that offers you multiple other features to help you stay efficient & connected to your team. It allows you to manage your scanned notes from the bravo notebooks as well as manage all your documents & save them in one place.

HowItWorks.title: How it works?
HowItWorks.step2: Start writing notes in your notebook.
HowItWorks.step3: Scan your notes using our app.
HowItWorks.step4: Create your notebooks & organize your scanned notes!
HowItWorks.step5: Share your scanned notes & flashcards with you teammates & colleagues easily.
HowItWorks.box: Buy our notebook & start scanning, organizing & sharing all your notes & flashcards...

BuyBravo.title: Buy our Bravo Smart Notebook to
BuyBravo.subTitle: They’re the perfect pair!
BuyBravo.text1: Our Bravo smart notebook was designed to work seamlessly with our bravo link application! Allowing you to digitalize the notebook & have it not only physically but digitally on your devices.
BuyBravo.text2: Camera detects our unique QR code for authentication of notebook
BuyBravo.question: Why download Bravo Link?

Ai.title: Download our app & get free access to our

Process.text1: Bravo Link allows you to sync calendars, share & delegate tasks with your colleagues & teammates to track each others progress & work on team projects.
Process.text2: Using advanced scanning technology, our scanner camera scan your written notes in the highest quality and allows you to not only save it as notes but also create flashcards! For ease of use, you are allowed to create digital notebooks to save & sort your scanned notes & flashcards in.
Process.text3: Our smart Bravo notebooks are designed to allow you to create flashcards from the notes already taken. You simply select the sentences you want to have in the flashcards , and our smart technology automatically creates the flashcard for you!
Process.title4: Send & receive all your files easily
Process.text4: Share all your scanned notes, documents & flashcards internally with Bravo Link handle, which is a unique ID for each user.
Process.title5: Gemini AI at the touch of your hands!
Process.text5: Bravo Gemini AI feature allows you to explore & enjoy all the benefits of the technology with one click!
